title: Remove Free Case Review section and repoint all CTAs/links to Contact anchor

requirements.summary: Remove the Free Case Review section from the landing page so it is not rendered and no longer exists in the DOM.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page no longer renders the FreeCaseReviewSection component.
There is no DOM element with id="free-case-review" on the page.
Build succeeds with no unused-import TypeScript errors in LandingPage.

file_operations.description: Remove the FreeCaseReviewSection import and delete the <section id="free-case-review"> block so it is no longer rendered; ensure no unused imports remain.

requirements.summary: Repoint all CTAs/links that previously scrolled to the removed Free Case Review section so they smoothly scroll to a dedicated Contact anchor near the footer, and update CTA labels accordingly.
acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation no longer includes a link labeled “Free Case Review”.
Hero primary CTA no longer scrolls to id="free-case-review" and no longer says “Start Your Free Case Review”.
Each “Active Lawsuits” item no longer scrolls to id="free-case-review" and no longer uses the label “Start your free case review”.
Footer “Quick Links” no longer includes “Free Case Review”.
Clicking the updated CTAs performs smooth scrolling to the chosen Contact/footer anchor on both desktop and mobile menus.

file_operations.description: Introduce a dedicated Contact scroll target anchored near the footer (e.g., add a <section id="contact"> wrapper immediately above the Footer) while keeping the app as a one-page smooth-scroll site.

Remove the 'Free Case Review' nav link, add/ensure a 'Contact' link that scrolls to the new contact anchor, and repoint the primary 'Get Started' CTA (desktop + mobile) to scroll to the Contact anchor with smooth scrolling.
Repoint the hero primary CTA scroll behavior to the Contact anchor and replace user-facing CTA text that mentions “free case review” with consultation/contact wording in English.
Repoint each Active Lawsuits card CTA to scroll to the Contact anchor and update the button label to remove “free case review” wording while preserving smooth scroll behavior.
Update Footer 'Quick Links' to remove 'Free Case Review' and include a 'Contact' quick link that smoothly scrolls to the Contact anchor near the footer.

requirements.summary: Update remaining page copy to remove references to submitting/completing a case review form and keep disclaimers in English without implying a form exists.
acceptanceCriteria: No visible paragraph text encourages the user to “complete this short form” or “submit a case review form”.
Footer disclaimer text is adjusted so it does not reference “Submitting a case review form” (keep the disclaimer otherwise intact and in English).

file_operations.description: Revise Step 1 title/description to remove any implication of an on-site form (e.g., remove “Complete our short form” / “case review form” language) while keeping the three-step explanation in English.
Update hero paragraph copy to remove “free case review” phrasing and replace with consultation/contact wording in English (no form implications).
Update the section intro paragraph to remove “start your free case review”/form-implying language and replace with consultation/contact wording in English.
Adjust the legal disclaimer sentence that references “Submitting a case review form” so it does not imply a form exists, keeping the disclaimer otherwise intact and in English.
